parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description:
The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

>  To allow all applications to trigger back-to-origin stream pulling, set the value to **ali_all_app**.

parameters.name: PullAppName
parameters.description:
The application for back-to-origin stream pulling.

>  To use the application specified in the streaming URL, leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: PullDomainName
parameters.description: The origin server of the live stream. Separate multiple origin servers with semicolons (;).

parameters.name: PullProtocol
parameters.description:
The protocol for back-to-origin stream pulling. Valid values:

*   **rtmp**
*   **httpflv**
*   **hls**
